name: Neverland VR
description:
Platform: VR (tested to be compatible with HTC vive, Oculus rift)

Neverland is a VR dungeon crawler set in a medieval fantasy world.

Mysterious islands have recently arisen from the depths of the seas and have been rumored to house dungeons that contain treasures of unimaginable riches. Play as an adventurer who has recently arrived at one of these islands in hopes of striking gold and making it rich.

HOW TO PLAY:

You have 4 holsters, 2 on each side of your hips and another 2 on your shoulders. Holsters can hold swords. Purchase swords from the shop outside the dungeon with gold that you find inside the dungeon.  

To block enemy attacks, simply parry the enemy attack by hitting their weapons when they attack you. If you have a shield, holding it in front of you will suffice.

Disclamer: Game is an early prototype, please excuse any bugs you may encounter.
